description: This file defines the DUEL templating engine, including type definitions, view binding, rendering to HTML and DOM, and utility functions. It includes internal classes and methods for processing templates, handling errors, and converting templates into DOM elements or HTML strings.

classes.name: Markup
classes.description: Wraps a string value to maintain as raw markup in output, with a toString method for rendering.

classes.name: Result
classes.description: Represents a view result, capable of rendering to HTML string or DOM, and handling errors.

methods.name: append
methods.description: Appends a child node to a parent node, handling different types of children (arrays, objects, strings, numbers).

methods.name: bindContent
methods.description: Binds a template node to data, processing child nodes and attributes.

methods.name: loop
methods.description: Processes a loop template, iterating over data or object properties.

methods.name: xor
methods.description: Processes conditional template blocks, selecting the first true condition.

methods.name: call
methods.description: Invokes another view/template with provided data and parameters.

methods.name: part
methods.description: Replaces a placeholder part with a named partial view.

methods.name: bind
methods.description: Main function that binds a template node to data, dispatching based on node type.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Renders a view as an HTML string.

methods.name: toDOM
methods.description: Converts a view result into DOM nodes, optionally replacing or merging into existing DOM.

methods.name: reload
methods.description: Replaces the entire document with the current view.
